plot: After a plane crash, one man's love turns into his last memory. A resolution to memorize his beloved one turns into a frantic obsession to build a model plane named 'RomanticA'.
title: RomanticA
plot_es: After a plane crash, one man's love turns into his last memory. A resolution to memorize his beloved one turns into a frantic obsession to build a model plane named 'RomanticA'.
